price: ߜߍ߬ߘߍ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߖߌ߰ ߟߊ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߡߊ߬ ߸ ߒ ߧߴߏ߬ ߞߏߝߐ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
